車路士剛戰經歷自1996年以來，聯賽最大敗仗，領隊沙利賽後表示對球員表現無能為力；無論如何，球隊今戰必定變陣，馬高斯阿朗素、安達斯基斯坦臣及巴克里將會復任正選。

哈特斯菲爾德成功收購英甲查爾頓前鋒艾伊尼格蘭，隨時可以候命上陣。今場同時是新領隊舒維特的第2場英超賽事，續力爭為這支包尾球隊，打開不勝困局。最大喜訊當然是中場大將阿倫穆爾，剛戰以後備姿態復出，勢令球隊中場聯繫力度大增。

replies.msg:
"Everyone needs to be ashamed of what happened in the last game," Germany international Rudiger said.

"Everyone needs to think very deeply about that because you can win, lose or draw, but it's the manner which is important.

"In the second half, I can't really describe it. We went out and they scored after two minutes then things went very badly. Nothing came from us - N'Golo [Kante] had a half chance but that was it.

"If you look at the view of football, we made it too easy for Bournemouth by losing the ball up front - everyone knows Bournemouth are going on the counter, and they were waiting for this.

"We have played better this season and that's what hurts, we didn't really try to change this result, that is what is bad."

"We call ourselves a top team, but this cannot happen to us," he added. "We have to be mentally strong for the rest of the season.

"It's clear now, we are Chelsea, there has been a lot of criticism from outside but here we must be cool in our mind and be honest with ourselves.

"Tactics is not my business because I am not the coach, I am a player, but everyone needs to commit again.

"If we speak about last season, we were solid in defence. Granted it was a different system, but we need to go back to basics because it's not normal for a Bournemouth player to take on four defenders and go through.

"Those basics are to win challenges, to look for challenges. It's nice if you have possession but everyone needs to know what their job is, which is, first and foremost, getting a clean sheet.

"We have to find continuity because right now there are too many ups and downs. We have to win against Huddersfield and show a big reaction after the Bournemouth defeat."

"This month we will show our real face, everyone needs to be ready for that," Rudiger says. "There is a lot on the line.

"The outcome in this month will show which way we go. Everyone needs to know what's going on right now, if you think as an individual you will fail."

(SkySports)

goodbye and thank you TamJai

車路士近況低迷，亦鬧出將帥不和的傳聞，其中一個與領隊沙利最貌合神離的，便是早前透過傳媒與這位意籍教頭隔空口水戰的夏薩特。此時，前車仔兼比利時國家隊隊友泰拔高圖爾斯，竟然在訪問中力勸夏神跟隨他，今夏一同效力皇家馬德里。

眾所周知，夏薩特一直嚮往轉投皇馬，加上最近沙利非常決絕地表示若對方想走，便絕不會留人，兩人之間的心病已漸漸浮上面。正當車仔周中大敗給般尼茅夫，更衣室一片混亂，去夏「落車」加盟皇馬的門將泰拔高圖爾斯，竟然惟恐不亂，放話明撬夏神。

高圖爾斯接受比利時報章Het Nieuwsblad訪問時，談到皇馬要尋一個像基斯坦奴朗拿度級數的球員接班，他選擇了同為比利時同胞的夏薩特：「我喜歡他的踢法，也很想繼續與他同效一支球隊，但這是主席（佩雷斯）去決定的事，那不關我的事，我也不知道未來會發生甚麼。」

高圖爾斯當然也不敢得罪目前皇馬的隊友：「其實球隊現在已很有質素，賓施馬最近狀態極佳，今季已轟入17球；加里夫巴利也是出色的球員，但必須要少一點傷患。」
